metadata.title: Jorge Bastidas | decode9 - Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience. Specialized in scalable architectures, automation, and MVP development. TypeScript, React, Node.js, DevOps.

about.title: Building the
about.subtitle: A passionate developer creating tech solutions that make a real impact on businesses and their users.
about.intro: Since 2014, I've been turning ideas into functional digital products.
about.paragraph1: My focus is on process automation for businesses and everyday tasks. I've worked with various companies, especially startups and businesses looking to optimize their operations through technology.
about.paragraph2: As an infrastructure lead and senior developer, I've guided teams in building scalable solutionsâ€”from MVPs to enterprise systems. My passion for video games has also led me to explore game development.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Development
fullstack.description: End-to-end development from frontend to backend, building robust web and mobile applications.

architecture.title: Software Architecture
architecture.description: Designing scalable systems with microservices, clean architecture, and modern design patterns.

devops.title: DevOps & Cloud
devops.description: CI/CD pipelines, containerization with Docker/Kubernetes, and cloud deployments on AWS/DigitalOcean.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Building tools and scripts to streamline business processes and workflows.

tech.title: My
tech.subtitle: The tools and technologies I use to build high-quality solutions.
tech.footer: Always learning and exploring new technologies.

projects.title: Featured
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects showcasing my experience and technical skills.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Examples of architectures and design patterns I implement in my projects.

microservices.title: Microservices Architecture
microservices.description: Distributed systems design with independent services, async communication, and high availability.

clean.title: Clean Architecture
clean.description: Clear separation of concerns with independent layers: domain, application, and infrastructure.

event.title: Event-Driven Architecture
event.description: Async communication through events, service decoupling, and horizontal scalability.

cqrs.title: CQRS Pattern
cqrs.description: Separating read and write operations to optimize performance and scalability.

problems.title: Common
problems.subtitle: Real-world problems I've solved along with their optimized solutions.

contact.title: Let's Work
contact.subtitle: Got a project in mind? I'd love to hear your ideas and help bring them to life.
contact.description: I'm available for freelance projects, technical consulting, or just chatting about tech. Feel free to reach out.
contact.findMe: You can also find me on
contact.availableDescription: Currently taking on new projects. Average response time is 24-48 hours.

footer.description: Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience building innovative tech solutions. Specialized in scalable architectures and process automation.
